other_tests.findings: During the hospital admission for myocardial infarction, the patient had low testosterone and gonadotropin levels consistent with hypogonadotropic hypogonadism.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At follow-up 6 months post-MI, testosterone levels were in the mid-normal range and gonadotropin levels were elevated.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated markedly elevated testosterone and gonadotropin levels.
